code: export var REST={getBoard:function getBoard(){return fetch("http://localhost:5000/puzzle");},solveBoard:function solveBoard(grid){var data={board:grid};return fetch("http://localhost:5000/solve",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)});},validateBoard:function validateBoard(grid){var data={board:grid};return fetch("http://localhost:5000/validate",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)});}};
